definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet

sentences.english: It was caused by local pollution.
sentences.chinese: 酸雨主要是局地污染造成。

sentences.english: In this paper, the acid rain's corrosion effect and its mechanism for natural white marble were studied by the simulated method.
sentences.chinese: 采用模拟的方法研究了酸雨对天然汉白玉的危害。

sentences.english: Changsha city is one of the severest polluted cities by acid rain in Central-south China.
sentences.chinese: 长沙市是中南地区酸雨污染最为严重的城市之一。

sentences.english: Effects of simulated acid rain on polyamine contents in young fruits of …
sentences.chinese: 模拟酸雨对龙眼幼果多胺含量的影响研究。

sentences.english: This paper surveys the history of the discovery of the acid precipitation and provides a summary of its forming process.
sentences.chinese: 本文追朔了酸雨的历史，综述了酸雨的形成过程。

sentences.english: This paper surveys the history of the discovery of the acid precipitation and provides a summary of its forming process.
sentences.chinese: 本文追朔了酸雨的历史，综述了酸雨的形成过程。

sentences.english: Probe into Ningde city fall acid rain frequency and relation of season in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 探讨宁德市降雨中酸雨频率与季节变化的关系。

sentences.english: To simulate acid raining environment, TCLP method was used in soaking test.
sentences.chinese: 考虑酸雨环境，浸出实验采用TCLP标准。

sentences.english: That banner said, "We the People Say No to Acid Rain."
sentences.chinese: 那面旗子上写道“我们讨厌酸雨“。

sentences.english: The protective effect of calcium on muskmelon seedling harmed by acid rain was studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了钙对酸雨伤害甜瓜幼苗的影响。

sentences.english: The frequency is large with the westerly wind but small with the northeasterly wind in southern Fujian.
sentences.chinese: 闽南地区在偏西风下的酸雨出现率大，东北风下最小。

sentences.english: Liuzhou is one of the serious acid rain area in China.
sentences.chinese: 柳州市是我国酸雨出现的高频区和严重地区。

sentences.english: Sulfur dioxide is one of the main causes of acid rain .
sentences.chinese: 二硫化物是形成酸雨的主要原因之一。

sentences.english: Emissions from a power plant lead to the formation of acid rain.
sentences.chinese: 发电厂的排出物导致了酸雨的形成。

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 qi4 hou4 bian4 nuan3

definition: global warming (PRC usage)/written 全球暖化 in Taiwan
